For Thursday, January 24

21 January 2013 in assignments
Tweet

We will begin to apply what we’ve studied in Romantic English poetry to Romantic German poetry and art song. Review, if necessary, the resources on poetry:

  • Jonathan Sircy’s introduction to Analyzing poetry.
  • Vanier College’s Poetry’s Language.
  • Vanier College’s Poetry’s Structure and Form.
  • Brooklyn College’s Introduction to Romanticism.

Also, bookmark the LEO online German dictionary.

If you have a pocket German dictionary, please bring it to class.

There is no entry ticket. However, consult Friday’s assignment post and get started on the entry ticket for Friday.
